CustomField.description: This field captures the referrer. It is a lookup to the account where we store various types of referrer like people (clients, colleagues, or introducers) and businesses. Maps to an equivalent field on the lead.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The client, colleague, introducer, or business that made the referral.
CustomField.label: Referrer

lookupFilter.errorMessage: Must be a colleague, person, or business.
